name: RalphGame
description:
Install instructions

Just install, choose your resolution, and play! The demo is around 15 minutes, and sets the story for the rest of RalphGame. If you have any questions, feel free to email me at @ralphgamee@gmail.com (that's two "E"s) or reach out to me via Instagram or Twitter, both at @ralphgame_   . I'm launching a Kickstarter on May 1st, and if you think you'd be interested in backing, please check out the pre-launch page! 

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/ralphgame/ralphgame-0
